name: Melty Dream
description:
Melty Dream is a game made in a month where you explore many different places.

A lot of the places are inspired by the area I live.

Many of the things I did on this project I only learned and created during the time frame of the 1 month deadline.
Some things are not perfect, and I did not get everything into the game that I wanted (possible update?), but I still think it creates a interesting experience and I hope you will enjoy it too!

Other Controls

G - Toggle fullscreen

Tab - Inventory
